questionTitle: Julie's schoolbag is red. ___ schoolbag is red.
Tom and Julie's little sister is 10. ___ little sister is 10.
Vanessa's bike is broken. ___ bike is broken
David's car is in the garage. ___ car is in the garage
Lisa is a nice girl. What's ___ family name?
John loves sport. ___ favourite sport is soccer.
She loves listening to music. ___ favourite singer is Madonna.
They love red. ___ favourite color is red.
They have got one sister. ___ name is Jennifer.
She has got a brother. ___ name is Tom.
